# Histograms in R


```{r, message=FALSE}
### Basic histogram
library(plotly)
plot_ly(x = rnorm(50), type = "histogram")

### Overlaid histograms
plot_ly(x = rnorm(500), opacity = 0.6, type = "histogram") %>%
  add_trace(x = rnorm(500)+1) %>%
  layout(barmode="overlay")
```
